data_table.description: Medication Survey Form, Exam 1. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: MSRAFLAG
variable.description: MSRAFLAG [Medication Survey Form, exam 1]

variable.name: MSRACY
variable.description: Contact year [1] [Medication Survey Form, exam 1]

variable.value: Forgot or was unable to bring medications

variable.name: MSRA09

variable.name: MSRA10
variable.description: [Interview]. During the past two weeks, did you take any (other) medication for arthritis, fever, or muscle aches and pains, (or menstrual cramps)? Q10 [Medication Survey Form, exam 1]
